title: Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai
synopsis: Buried within the numerous clubs at Nijigasaki High School lies the school idol club. The club, while lacking popularity, definitely does not lack potential. During their debut performance, they were able to seize a sizable audience, along with the attention of their schoolmates Ayumu Uehara and Yuu Takasaki.
related_anime: ['Love Live! Superstar!!', 'Love Live! Sunshine!!', 'Love Live! School Idol Project', 'Muteki-kyuu*Believer / Mirai Harmony', 'Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai 2nd Season']
